body.text:
{% if colgate_ng_language_options == 'Others' and colgate_ng_other_language == '1' %}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Batutuwan da aka zaba: Amfani da gishiri & gawayi 
Zaɓi tambayoyin cikin jerin da ke ƙasa, don samun shawarwarin kula da baki

 1. Goge baki da Aswaki
 2. Sinadarin  goge baki na ruwa
 3. Mahinmmanci 
 4. Man goge baki da gishiri {%else%}_[Q No. 2/2 ]_
Selected Topic: salt and charcoal

 Choose an option.

 1. Brushing with sticks
 2. Using mouthwash only
 3. Benefit of using Colgate
 4. Toothpaste or salt{%endif%}
